Title: Bindass
Writer: Janardhan Maharshi (story), D. Rajendra Babu (screenplay), Malavalli Saikrisna (dialogue), Kaviraj (lyricist), V. Nagendra Prasad (lyricist)
Actors: Puneeth Rajkumar, Hansika Motwani, Nasser, Suman
Plot: Shivu, a pickpocket who sells cinema tickets in black likes Preethi a lot. Preethi, daughter of ACP Vikram Rathod also falls for Shivu and gets him a job of a police informer.
